title: Isa review
content: Can one's marks decrease after isa review as in our physics isa, there are 2 questions carrying 3 marks which look to be wrongly corrected according to some of my friends and I have marked the correct answers itself according to the answer key, so will my marks decrease after review

comments.body:
No it won't decrease as per our teacher. He told that they select the best marks.
+Review for isa3 is yet to happen

Definitely there is a chance for increase or decrease in isa marks after isa review. If u marked any questions for review and if it is not correct according to the evaluators they might reduce the previous marks u got from that question
